title: Emerald Splendor: Kundan Inspired Bangle
materials: featuring a central Emerald of exceptional clarity and brilliance. Accented with high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones.
features: This exquisite bangle blends traditional Kundan craftsmanship with a modern aesthetic. The openwork design showcases intricate filigree work reminiscent of traditional South Indian jewelry. The central emerald is meticulously set within a framework of sparkling CZ stones. The bangle's design draws inspiration from both Hyderabad's royal heritage and classic South Indian motifs.
colors: The warm yellow of the 22K gold complements the vibrant green of the emerald and the dazzling white of the CZ stones
creating a rich and luxurious color palette.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for modern events and adding a touch of elegance to your everyday attire.
description: This bangle is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, blending traditional techniques with a contemporary design. The high-quality materials and meticulous detailing ensure lasting beauty and value. The emerald, a symbol of prosperity and good fortune, adds a touch of auspiciousness to this already stunning piece. Its lightweight design makes it comfortable to wear for extended periods.
